lead_paragraph: The Republican National Committee has announced the appointment of an advisory council of forty-nine members to develop "a realistic peacetime program" for the United States in the post-war world. Notably absent from the list of forty-nine are the last three Presidential candidates of the Republican party -- Mr. Willkie, Mr. Hoover and Mr. Landon.
